headline: Meta upgraded, PNC Financial downgraded: Wall Street’s top analyst calls
summary: The most talked about and market moving research calls around Wall Street are now in one place. Here are today’s research calls that investors need to know, as compiled by The Fly. Top 5 Upgrades: Needham upgraded Meta Platforms (META) to Hold from Underperform with no price target.
